TopicTitle: Help with remotetech and remotetech seti

Articles.Content: I am fairly new to ksp so forgive my possibly simple question but i have installed the remotetech mod and remotetech seti config files. it is all working ok apart from i am not getting the extra relay station on kerbin showing up i only get the space center one.   Is there something simple i am missed ?  Any help would be greatly appreciated
what kind of extra relay station? any reference?

18 hours ago, redcrowsgt said:

I am fairly new to ksp so forgive my possibly simple question but i have installed the remotetech mod and remotetech seti config files. it is all working ok apart from i am not getting the extra relay station on kerbin showing up i only get the space center one.   Is there something simple i am missed ?  Any help would be greatly appreciated 

Those extra ground relay stations are coming from different mods,two of them being

you can also add those station yourself ,the instructions can be found here:https://remotetechnologiesgroup.github.io/RemoteTech/modders/ground/

On 5.6.2016 at 9:48 PM, redcrowsgt said:

I am fairly new to ksp so forgive my possibly simple question but i have installed the remotetech mod and remotetech seti config files. it is all working ok apart from i am not getting the extra relay station on kerbin showing up i only get the space center one.   Is there something simple i am missed ?  Any help would be greatly appreciated 

Fixed it in new SETIremoteTechConfig version. Please make sure to properly delete all leftovers from previous SETIremoteTechConfig versions.
